text: "Ay Chico (Lengua Afuera)" () is the second single from the album El Mariel by American rap artist Pitbull. It peaked at number 92 on the Billboard Hot 100 in the U.S. It was produced by Mr. Collipark. ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !align="left"|Chart (2006–07) !align="left"|Peak Position |- |align="left"|US Billboard Hot 100 |align="center"|92 |- |align="left"|US Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs |align="center"|99 |- |align="left"|US Billboard Rhythmic Songs |align="center"|19 |- |align="left"|US Billboard Rap Songs |align="center"|19 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2006 singles Category:2006 songs Category:Pitbull (rapper) songs Category:TVT Records singles Category:Spanglish songs Category:Songs written by Pitbull (rapper) Category:Songs written by Mr. Collipark
title: Ay Chico (Lengua Afuera)
